hero.title: Welcome to my portfolio
hero.subtitle: Where others see data, I see opportunity.
about.title: About Me
about.1: I’m a data scientist with hands-on experience since 2021 and a solid academic background in Computer Science, with a master’s in Applied AI and an MBA in Data Science & Analytics (USP/ESALQ).
about.2: I have worked on national and international projects in pricing, segmentation, optimization, and simulation using Python, SQL, Azure, Databricks, and modern machine learning and deep learning libraries. I’m experienced in Big Data, ETL pipelines, and MLOps practices with CI/CD.
about.3: In my daily work, I apply agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban. I stand out for my analytical thinking, clear communication of insights, business vision, and collaboration with multidisciplinary teams — all essential to turning data into strategic decisions.
